data: {"generalSituation":"A dry northeast monsoon will bring generally fine weather to the coast of Guangdong in the next few days. It will be cool in the morning over the region. The temperature difference between day and night will be rather large over inland areas. A band of clouds is expected to affect the coast of southern China midweek next week. The weather will be cloudier and temperature will rise slightly over the region. A replenishment of the monsoon will reach southern China in the latter part of next week. Temperatures will fall with cool mornings and nights over the region.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251227","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 3 to 4, occasionally force 5 offshore at first.","forecastWeather":"Dry and becoming fine.
